name: Lonely Platform
description:
Note: Due to some minor bugs occuring in the html version, we reccomend playing the downloaded version. (timer flipping out and some platforms not calibrated)

MADE BY: Idan bar, Roi Eliasian and Erez Bracha

Precisely aim and time your jump from a platform to itself in this unique 2d pixel art platformer!  This adds the twist from normal platformer games of having to time many of your jumps in accordance with the platform.
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam following the theme: "Only one".

Controls: 

Movement: A and D Or Left and right arrow keys.

Jump and wall jump : Space bar.

Platform types:

Pink: 

normal.

Yellow: bouncy.

Blue: Ice.

Instructions for the downloaded version:

1) Unzip.

2) Run the "Lonely Platform" executable.
